title: Prayer practices
author: joshualinog

excerpt: 1. Eating the bread 2. Meditation first half 3. Bring out and hand over embarrassment (humiliation)  4. Everyone Bless an individual child's spaces 5. Burden swap 6. Brother cherubim FaceTime 7. Devot
content:
1. Eating the bread
2. Meditation first half
3. Bring out and hand over embarrassment (humiliation) 
4. Everyone Bless an individual child's spaces
5. Burden swap
6. Brother cherubim FaceTime
7. Devotional verse/passage prayer
8. Take turns loving on Yeshua 
9. Practice the vigil of loving on Yeshua (inward prayer / chanting)
10. Pray an 8 verse Hebrew letter stanza of Psalm 119 to Yeshua 
11. Pray through the Lord's prayer in your own words
12. Pray through the foundational 5 Ws (who what where when why) 
13. Practice loving on the glory ( thought act)
14. Practice loving on the glory ( speech act )
15. Practice loving on the glory ( movement act )
16. Take turns throwing hands / listing thankfuls
17. Take turns loving confessing sins, revealing nasty gimme gimmes
18. Take turns confessing thanks for a present neighbor
19. Loving on the brethren, Take turns loving on neighbors present 
20. Pray a Psalm 
21. Seek yeshua's face revealed to you
22. Mourn the exile and death of humanity 
23. Mourn loss of yeshua's face & local shekinah
24. Physical fighting letters spelling prayer
25. Pray through the ten words
26. Pray through the ashreis 
27. Tikkun chatzot
28. Stupid requests 
29. Dancing through seven space physical model
30. Do Moses Aaron Hur and Joshua sword of word faithfulness burden bearing for weak brother / sister
31. Rearrangement prayer 
32. Imagining Eden you Eden other Eden Earth as vivid request and source of true mourning 
33. Presenting yourself as a Rearrangement staircase offering
